casebody.data:
[S. F. No. 5834. In Bank. January 9, 1913.] E. E. NICHOLS, Appellant, v. BOULEVARD GARDENS LAND COMPANY (a Corporation), Respondent. Corporation—Bepur chase of Stock.—Judgment reversed on the authority of Schulte v. Boulevard Gardens Land Company, ante, p. 464. APPEAL from a judgment of the Superior Court of Alameda County. John Ellsworth, Judge. The facts are similar to those stated in the opinion in Schulte v. Boulevard Gardens Land Company, ante, p. 464.

J. A. Elston, and George Clark, for Appellant.

Keyes & Martin, and Leon E. Martin, for Respondent.

THE COURT.

This cause presents precisely the same questions as those considered in the opinion in Schulte v. Boulevard Gardens Land Company, ante, p. 464, [129 Pac. 582], filed this day. Upon the authority of that decision, the judgment herein is reversed.
